name: BEAT MONSTER
description:
Controls:

Only mouse: drag actions to beat types and launch the beat to see what happens next

Details:

Game music and sound synchronises with your and enemy's actions

The game has 3 types of monsters and 5 increasing difficulty levels, your goal is to beat as much BEATS as you can. 

Post your high score in the comments :)

The game is designed for mobile, but because of the timeframe I will post the desktop versions

I was busy the whole time on my main job, but thankfully I have spent 21 hours on it and it looks pretty much like I wanted it to be :)

You can see the source code here - https://bitbucket.org/volkoivan/beat-monster/src/master/

Made for MizJam #1
